StruggleBug.name: Struggle Bug
StruggleBug.describtion: The user attacks the opposing creature.

BugBuzz.name: Bug Buzz
BugBuzz.describtion: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave.

AttackOrder.name: Attack Order
AttackOrder.describtion: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target.

Megahorn.name: Megahorn
Megahorn.describtion: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target.
